content: I am a full-stack web developer and computer science student at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

I have a primary focus on frontend development, making clean and user-friendly websites. However, I also have experience building backend systems and APIs. In addition to my core focus, I enjoy learning about topics such as software automation, data science, and machine learning, and I look forward to applying those technologies in my projects to enhance functionality and user experience.
If you're looking for someone who values both form and function, feel free to explore my work, and don't hesitate to reach out â€” I'm always seeking to connect and collaborate!
